original_text: And since I could not see because of the brightness of that light, I was led by the hand by those who were with me, and came into Damascus.
korean_text: 나는 그 빛의 광채로 말미암아 볼 수 없게 되었으므로 나와 함께 있는 사람들의 손에 끌려 다메섹에 들어갔노라

sentences.original_text: And since I could not see
because of the brightness of that light
I was led by the hand
by those who were with me
